Author: esberanza
Text: Are you me? I only b/p about once a week as well, and my whole day is ruined if it happens early in the day! My binges usually happen late at night though... I absolutely hate purging, and lately I've just taken some sleeping pills after binging, so I'll get knocked out and won't have to think about what happened. I gain weight, but at least my throat ain't sore in the morning.

Author: xiaoyingdou
Text: I can't really offer any advice, but stay strong!! you are amazing no matter what, and you can beat this!! I'm here for you ðŸ’•
